blog.description: You'll find reader insert fics for NCIS, NCIS LA, NCIS NOLA, Rizzoli and Isles, Harry Potter, Forever, Brooklyn 99, The Good Place, Castle, Fantastic Beasts and Where To Find Them, One Day At A Time, The Princess Diaries and Glee. Imagines/ requests/ prompts are open.  FULL MASTERLIST

title: Baby Girl
body:
gif is mine


@harryxhermioneisharmony said: “I love you Daddy” with Daddy!Draco


He looked down into the face of his little girl. Her chubby cheeks and bright blue eyes were staring up at him, as she beamed with so much happiness. When he had found out that his ex was carrying his child he had begged for her to keep the baby, when she had heard your wishes and how you wanted to do better by your unborn child she had decided to keep it. However, after giving birth she had abandoned you and your daughter, she’d given up her parental rights and left you to care for the young girl. Something you had struggled with at first, as you hadn’t quite realised just how much work having a child would be. You had had eleven glorious years with your daughter Y/N, so far, and when she had received her Hogwarts letter you had been ecstatic. Now though, as he held his daughter close he didn’t want to let her go. This would be the first time in her life that she would be spending more than one night away from him, he didn’t want his little girl to go.

“Daddy!” Y/N says, squirming in her dad’s arms, the whistle for the train sounding for the first time, he knew from his own experience that the next whistle was mere moments away. Placing a kiss on her forehead you say

“Promise you’ll write as soon as your back in your dormitory. And then write every week, telling me of your progress at school? Promise that you’ll do your best in class?” she nods enthusiastically

“Of course I will daddy” she says. You lean down and place one last kiss on her forehead

“I love you baby girl” you say and she looks up at you

“I know daddy. I’ll see you at Christmas” she says. Running towards the Hogwarts Express. When she’s on the train, she’s about to make her way down the corridor before she stops, turning back to you she calls out

“Daddy!” you look up, seeing a nervous smile on her face, and tears in her eyes

“Yeah baby girl?” you ask and she lets out a small sob before she says

“I’m going to miss you” a pause as she wipes away her tears and scrunches up her face

“I love your Daddy!” you beam at her as the whistle sounds for the final time

“I love you too baby girl”. You stand on the platform, waving at her until the train is well and truly gone. Finally, you sigh, stuffing your hands in your pockets you exit the gate and make your way back towards your small apartment in London, waiting for your daughter’s owl.


Tag List: @tiva-jenry-caskett-rizzles-densi, @jimmybpride, @dressed-up-just-like-z1ggy, @nikkiwierden, @samchelforever007, @kirkspockbones, @xoncisxncislaxncisnolaox, @lasalle-pride-sebastian-love, @haliannej, @brooklyn-99-amyxjake​, @mizzezm

Tag List for Harry Potter: @harryxhermioneisharmony

summary:
Ginny: So, you also love Harry
Ginny: And you just told him, just now, right before I did
Draco: Um, yeah, basically
Ginny: Well...
body:
Ginny: So, you also love Harry

Ginny: And you just told him, just now, right before I did

Draco: Um, yeah, basically

Ginny: Well this is just great

Ginny: We have to stay civil, he just has to pick one of us, and the loser will have to accept their fete with grace and dignity

Draco: Maybe if you lose. If he doesn’t pick me, imma start throwing stuff

summary:
Gif is mine 
He had left the battle field with his mother and father feeling absolutely horrible, the fight against the dark...
body:
Second Chances

Gif is mine

He had left the battle field with his mother and father feeling absolutely horrible, the fight against the dark Lord was still going on and he felt horrible. An intense feeling of guilt and despair filled him. What if he never got to see you again? He couldn’t bare the thought of losing you. A deep ache was sitting high in his chest, making it almost unbearable to breath. For the last two years of his life he had done everything his father had told him, everything the dark Lord had requested of him and he felt so guilty. It had been you, his bestest friend, his lover, and confidant that had helped him through. You always listened to him, you never saw the bad in him or blamed him for doing the things he had to do, those were things he had to do to fulfil everyone else’s wishes and demands. You believed in him and he was damn lucky to have found someone as amazing as you.

When the war was over the first thing you did was apparate to Malfoy Manor. You wanted to be with your boyfriend, more than anything especially now that the war was finished. Over the coming days, weeks and months all of you made your way back to Hogwarts to help in rebuilding the school. Draco was put on trial for being a death eater and unlike his father the wizengamont took pity on him for being coerced into the cause. He would forever be grateful for your presence throughout the trial. By the time September rolled around again you and Y/N were heading back to Hogwarts together getting a chance at your final year and NEWT level exams. It was also around that time that you ended up finding out you were pregnant with Draco’s child, a welcome surprise and a beacon of hope and new things to come for the future.

Tag List: @tiva-jenry-caskett-rizzles-densi, @jimmybpride, @dressed-up-just-like-z1ggy, @nikkiwierden, @samchelforever007, @kirkspockbones, @xoncisxncislaxncisnolaox, @lasalle-pride-sebastian-love, @haliannej, @brooklyn-99-amyxjake, @mizzezm

Tag List for Harry Potter: @harryxhermioneisharmony

blog.name: whiffingbooks
blog.title: Is there no way out of the mind?

title: During OOTP
body:
Harry: AND YOU WORTHLESS BEST FRIENDS DIDN’T WRITE TO ME! YOU-

Ginny: Hey Harry!

Harry: Hi Ginny! Love your hair!

Harry: I DIDN’T WANT ANYONE TO TALK TO ME!

Ginny: Well that was a bit stupid of you.

Harry: You’re right you piece of angel.

Harry: I WANT TO TALK TO SIRIUS!

Ginny: Chocolates?

Harry: Yes please. They look like your eyes.

Harry: WHAT THE HELL ARE YOU DOING HERE?! DID I ASK-

Ginny: There’s no need to take that tone with me.

Harry: You’re absolutely right my future wife.


Meanwhile everyone:

blog.name: everyfandomislovedbyme
blog.title: Untitled
blog.description: Random incorrect quotes that I believe fictional characters have said, but the authors of there story didn't put it in the books. I do The Mortal Instruments, Percy Jackson, Harry Potter, and more!

title: Harry Potter and the Slytherins:
body:
I love the books with all my fiber, don’t get me wrong, but there’s something bothersome. There had to be one Slytherin in all those seven years who was ambitious, cunning, and NICE. There had to be one person who didn’t laugh at Malfoy’s jokes, who didn’t call Harry by his last name, a person who DIDN”T TAKE A BADGE.

I mean, what the heck?

reblog.comment:

I mean, what the heck?

There had to be one person who didn’t laugh at Malfoy’s jokes, who didn’t call Harry by his last name, a person who DIDN”T TAKE A BADGE.

I mean, what the heck?

title: Everyone Is Someone At Home
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2DLRLCv

by FivePips, shadow_prince

When Jarl Remus captures the Celtic Prince, Sirius, all he needs is a bargaining chip to get his people back. The Viking doesn’t realize he is about to get so much more.

summary: Tom Felton estrela filme inspirado em Hamlet, de Shakespeare
title: Tom Felton estrela filme inspirado em Hamlet, de Shakespeare
description:
O ator Tom Felton, que interpretou Draco Malfoy em Harry Potter, está confirmado no elenco de Ophelia, filme inspirado em Hamlet, de William Shakespeare. Ele assume o papel de Laertes, irmão da protagonista, que dá nome à produção. O filme chega aos cinemas dos Estados Unidos em 2019, mas não tem previsão de lançamento no Brasil.

O longa-metragem também é inspirado no livro homônimo escrito por Lisa Klein, especialista em releituras da obra de Shakespeare. A história, que se passa no século XIV, é contada do ponto de vista de Ophelia, amante e esposa em potencial de Hamlet, conhecido por dizer a fala “ser ou não ser, eis a questão”. Apesar de ser secundário, o personagem de Tom Felton tem papel essencial para o desenvolvimento da trama em relação à vingança que planeja contra Hamlet.

CONTINUA DEPOIS DA PUBLICIDADE
(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

A mudança no foco narrativo é uma das diferenças do filme com relação à peça de Shakespeare. No original, a voz de Hamlet é predominante no desenrolar dos acontecimentos. Já no filme, quem assume este papel é Ophelia.

O primeiro trailer do filme estreou na terça-feira (30). O personagem de Tom aparece rapidamente e diz à irmã: “são tempos estranhos neste castelo, tenha medo”. Assista abaixo (em inglês):

O filme, dirigido pela australiana Claire McCarthy, de The Waiting City e The Turning, estreou em 2018 no Sundance Film Festival, evento importante para produções cinematográficas independentes. Chega aos cinemas norte-americanos em 28 de junho, mas ainda não tem previsão de estreia no Brasil.

The post Tom Felton estrela filme inspirado em Hamlet, de Shakespeare appeared first on Potterish.com.

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Freddie Weasley, Louis Weasley, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

summary: Harry Potter and the Hero's Reward
title: Harry Potter and the Hero's Reward
body:
by red_jacobson

After her rescue from Malfoy Manor, Luna decides to reward Harry but finds out she isn’t the only girl who has the same idea. Good thing Luna is a very open-minded girl, and so’s Ginny! NOTE: At the moment this story is basically a PWP, especially the Prologue, but that may change as the characters tell me the story.

Words: 5128, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Freddie Weasley, Louis Weasley, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!
trail.content:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. summary:
Tom: okay, so let me explain.
Draco: Wait. You understand more than 50% of the plan, I only get 30%.
Ron: 30%! I only understand...
body:
Tom: okay, so let me explain.

Draco: Wait. You understand more than 50% of the plan, I only get 30%.

Ron: 30%! I only understand 1%!

Harry: there’s a plan?
